abilities.name: Marvel Shell
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Shedinja by your opponent's Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies.

attacks.name: Spike Wound
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
